<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns a random element from the given array. Engine solution to [[BIS_fnc_selectRandom]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''selectRandom''' array

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] - array of anything

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]] - random selected value or [[Nothing]] if array is empty
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_randomElement = [[selectRandom]] [1,2,3,4,5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[selectRandomWeighted]], [[random]], [[select]], [[selectMin]], [[selectMax]]
</value></part></template>
